title: Brooch
description: abstract design; two undulating swirls extending from central round hammered element, forming circle; end of one swirl is short and has small raised loop; end of other swirl is long and has two small raised round elements
creditline: The David and Ruth Waterbury Endowment for Contemporary Craft
